data.name: 0000 (282.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato's always reading books, huh?

data.name: 0001 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I guess, but she's from the literature club. Isn't reading part of their activities?

data.name: 0002 (282.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're probably right…

data.name: 0003 (282.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: She was reading something that seemed inte- resting, so I asked if she could lend it to me.

data.name: 0004 (282.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll let you know if it's good.

data.name: 0005 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't exactly need recommendations from you…

data.name: 0006 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Though I suppose I can read it if it's Yuki's recommendation.

data.name: 0007 (282.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I just remembered, Kyon told me that Nagato's going to lend him a book.

data.name: 0008 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh...? I didn't know he read books. Why'd you bring it up?

data.name: 0009 (282.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, uhh--it's, um, I thought it was nice…

data.name: 0010 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh? If you want to read it I'm sure you can borrow it after Kyon, right?

data.name: 0011 (282.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: G-good point... Eeek…

data.name: 0013 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, Yuki! You really shouldn't be reading a book while walking!

data.name: 0014 (282.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …I promised to lend it after this.

data.name: 0015 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Lend? To who? Not Kyon, surely?

data.name: 0017 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's no need to finish it quickly for the likes of him, you know!

data.name: 0018 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: More importantly, I don't want you missing steps or bumping into walls.

data.name: 0019 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Put the book away for now.

data.name: 0020 (282.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Understood.

data.name: 0021 (282.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Nagato certainly seems to be fond of sci-fi novels.

data.name: 0022 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yuki? It always felt like she just reads any- thing, but... Yeah, I guess a lot of it is sci-fi.

data.name: 0023 (282.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How do you feel about sci-fi, Miss Suzumiya?

data.name: 0024 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I... Hmm, well it's ultimately all made up, right?

data.name: 0025 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Because of that, I feel like there's a lot more significance to...

data.name: 0026 (282.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ...pursuing real unnatural phenomena.

data.name: 0027 (282.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. You certainly have a point.
